sentences.sContent: They stand guard with weapons as the human survivors of the battle are marched onto the shuttle.
sentences.sContent_eng: They stand guard with weapons as the human survivors of the battle are marched onto the shuttle.
sentences.sCn: 他们站在一起用武器护卫着战后的人类幸存者鱼贯进入航天飞机。

sentences.sContent: When the humans are all back on Prometheus the last shuttle will be destroyed so no-one can come back.
sentences.sContent_eng: When the humans are all back on Prometheus the last shuttle will be destroyed so no-one can come back.
sentences.sCn: 当人类都返回普罗米修斯号后，最后一架航天飞机后将被摧毁，所以没有人能回来。

sentences.sContent: Of course, you could do experiments in the shuttle very well, where you have, again, only air around you.
sentences.sContent_eng: Of course, you could do experiments in the shuttle very well, where you have, again, only air around you.
sentences.sCn: 当然，也可以在航天飞机上做实验,除了空气周围什么都没有，效果一样。

synos.tran: [航]航天飞机；穿梭；[纺]梭子；穿梭班机、公共汽车等

phrases.pCn: 航天飞机（往返于地球和太空站之间运载人和物资的）
班车（在较短距离之间往返的交通车）；豪华轿车
n. 短程运输；往返大巴服务；区间飞航
穿梭式矿车；梭车；往返架车

remMethod.val: shut(关) ＋ tle → 封闭的空间 → 航天飞机
